name: I, Myself
description:
e·mo·tion

əˈmōSH(ə)n/
noun
plural noun: emotions

  1. a natural instinctive state of mind deriving from one's circumstances, mood, or relationships with others.

Emotions are enigmas. 

Explore environments and colors as perceived ideals of emotions as a part of yourself. 

How do you feel?

Talk to everything or everyone. Question what you see and do. How do we understand what we are saying ourselves?

Do you want to escape?

We don't belong in this world, yet we are always called back here. Do they really exist outside the realm of who we are? Outside of ourselves they do not exist but yet how can we see them now. 

Thanks for playing :)
